body.name: Martha Stewart Mira Modern Heathered Anti-Fatigue Air-Infused Kitchen Mat, Beige, 19.6"x39"
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: BRING MARTHA STEWART'S STYLE INTO YOUR HOME: The Mira Air Mat boosts an elevated style while offering the ultimate comfort and support to your feet.
WATER, STAIN & OIL RESISTANT: This mat is constructed with 100% Polyester textured and durable top layer that is water, stain and oil resistant.
ANTI-FATIGUE AIR-INFUSED: This cushioned mat is constructed with a middle layer of air-infused memory foam providing the ultimate anti-fatigue comfort for your feet, back and legs.
DURABLE AND SLIP RESISTANT: This kitchen mat is constructed with a skid-resistant SBR backing that provides a safe and secure surface for you to walk and step on.
VERSATILE USE: Update your kitchen or office space with this mat. Great to use under the kitchen sink, along the stove, near your workspace or even in the laundry room.
body.description: Bring comfort and style into your decor with the Martha Stewart Mira Air Mat. This kitchen mat offers a modern look that will add style to your décor. Machine made of textured polyester, this kitchen mat is ideal for wherever you may often stand for relief while you work, cook or clean. Enhanced with backing for a safe and secured step on any flat surface. This mat offers versatile use and can be used in the kitchen, bathroom, laundry room or office.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: WATER, STAIN & OIL RESISTANT This mat is constructed with 100% Polyester textured and durable top layer that is water, stain and oil resistant. This mat is also mold and mildew resistant. TRENDY PINEAPPLE DESIGN The Aloha Air Mat kitchen mat features a trendy pineapple design that will add style to your décor. DURABLE AND SLIP RESISTANT This kitchen mat is constructed with a skid-resistant SBR backing that provides a safe and secure surface for you to walk and step on.
ANTI-FATIGUE AIR-INFUSED This cushioned mat is constructed with a middle layer of air-infused memory foam providing the ultimate anti-fatigue comfort for your feet, back and legs.

MARTHA STEWART BRAND'S MISSION The Martha Stewart Brand’s mission is to inspire and empower people of all ages to make their homes and lives more beautiful, more functional, and more meaningful by offering high-quality products at a value, superior function and innovation, and beautiful design that elevates the home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty kitchen rug.
reviews.reviewText: I have several of these rugs and they are perfect for those concerned with tripping on rugs. They are beveled on edges and don’t move when walked on.They are a fabric, cushioned well and easy to spot clean. They are, however, overpriced, but I can often find it reduced on amazon to a more reasonable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I had one in a different place. They look great and clean easily!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Bought two, only one is as expected
reviews.reviewText: Bought two of these for our kitchen. One is as pictured in mint green, the other almost appears grey. I thought maybe the lighting, but even switched positions and the color just isn't there on the second mat. Very disappointed in the colors not matching as expected, otherwise the mat itself is good quality.Update: Rating drop from 3 to 1...these mats are easy to trip over and stain easily. Very regrettable purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Cushioning But Stains Easily
reviews.reviewText: I like these anti fatique mats. However, they stain easily and are not easy to clean. If you don’t cook in your kitchen or are a super neat cook, these will be great. For me, I’m going to have to find an alternative soon. Because mine look horrible now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfy
reviews.reviewText: I needed new mats in the kitchen since I was moving in with my now husband. My old ones were damaged and not fitting the vibes. Anyways I love the thickness and cushioning it has. It’s very supportive. Especially since we don’t have a dish washer. My back always hurts regardless but this makes standing over the sink and stove better. Plus the color is accurate and I love the texture as compared to the rubbery ones. If you have a cat just FYI They like to scratch it and I will damage a smidge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The top layer started to separate from the rug and bubbled up…
reviews.reviewText: The rug is very pretty and also very nice to stand on….however, the quality is sub-par, the top layer started to separate from the under layers about 3 days after we got it, now it looks all bubbles on top. Disappointing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the softness these are so great I bought two. I don’t trip over them in the kitchen. They’re easy to sweep and clean up dog hair, easy to remove kitchen drips, high-quality great price I highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not water or stain resistant
reviews.reviewText: It's a comfortable kitchen mat and it looks nice when new, but it is absolutely not water or stain resistant as indicated in the product description. It's also not easily washable. We have somewhat hard water which probably makes drips more noticeable but this mat looks pretty gross after a while. And unfortunately, it's not as easy as wiping up drips because it absorbs the water instantly.
